items.sentence: I doubt seriously that it was Tom who broke the window.
Mary told Tom she didn\'t want him to date other women.
Mary told me that she didn\'t love her husband anymore.
Mary\'s closet is full of clothes that she never wears.
Tom wanted me to keep it quiet until he talked to Mary.
Tom wanted to give Mary some earrings for her birthday.
I ran as fast as I could in order to catch up with Tom.
We\'ve accomplished almost everything we set out to do.
What makes you so sure that Tom won\'t be here tonight?
You don\'t really think Tom tried to cheat you, do you?
